title: Call charges to numbers starting with 08 or 03

details.description: The cost of calling a phone number depends on the 2 digits it starts with - check for 0800, 0808, 0845, 0870, 03 and other phone numbers
details.body:
The cost of calling a phone number depends on the 2 digits it starts with and who provides your phone service.

Calls from a mobile usually cost more than a land line and may not be included in your inclusive minutes.

Call charges - summary

Number begins with Cost from land lines (approximate)
01 2p to 10p per minute
02 2p to 10p per minute
03 2p to 10p per minute
0800 or 0808 Free
0870, 0871, 0845 etc 1p to 12.5p

You can download a detailed call charge guide from the Ofcom website.

Download ‘Number crunching: how much does a phone call really cost?’ (PDF, 50KB)
